attributes.action: Funding for 2 year old childcare should be available for all parents.
attributes.additional_details: Funding should be available to working parents not just parents that do not work or who are on a low income.
attributes.background:
Both myself and my husband work, my husband works full time and myself part time. We have 2 children.
I would love for my 2 year old to attend a playgroup but the cost is a big reason why he doesn’t. 
15 hours funding isn’t available as he has to wait until he’s 3yrs old.
